properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 12:23PM AKST until February 19 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel
conditions. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are
expected. Visibility may be reduced to one half mile or less at
times.

* WHERE...Western Arctic Coast.

* WHEN...6 AM Tuesday to noon Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as
low as 55 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10
minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO NOON AKST WEDNESDAY
